entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023
